title: Lectures vpon the first and second Epistles of Paul to the Thessalonians: preached by that faithfull seruant of God M. Robert Rollock, some-tyme minister of the Euangell of Iesus Christ, and rector of the Colledge in Edinburgh
author: Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599.
publisher: Printed by Robert Charteris printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,
